import React from 'react'; import './App.scss'; export default function App() { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = React.useState(false); const toggleMenu = () => setMenuOpen((v) => !v); const closeMenu = () => setMenuOpen(false); const offers = [ { id: 'border', title: 'Move the borders of reality!', description: "Go on a space adventure - it's possible with us!", variant: 'wide', theme: 'nebula', }, { id: 'space', title: 'Space is not just stars and planets', description: 'Go on a space adventure', variant: 'default', theme: 'onyx', }, { id: 'dreamers', title: 'For those who dream of stars', description: 'Our offer: make your dream come true', variant: 'default', theme: 'twilight', }, { id: 'fulfill', title: 'Fulfill your fantastic dreams', description: 'Space has never been so close', variant: 'wide', theme: 'aurora', }, ]; return (

Embark on a space journey

Travelling into space is one of the most exciting and unforgettable adventures that can change your life forever. Our experienced team allows you to go on a space journey and see the world the way few have. We guarantee safety, comfort, and incredible impressions while you enjoy every moment beyond the atmosphere. We offer various options for space excursions so that you can fully enjoy your adventure among the stars.
